WorkItem.Description:
I wasn't able to find a proper sample which explains how to programmatically protect an XPS file by applying a RMS template on it.
The only method I know of is using the ad rms bulk protection tool (rmsbulk.exe), which is cool for small XPS files, but takes a long time for relatively large XPS files (> 50 MB).
Â 
Thanks.
WorkItem.Summary: Programmatically apply RMS template to XPS file (C#)
